name: Build GenBank File
description: Creates and writes a GenBank file with annotated DNA components for a specified cloning strategy.

inputs.name: id
inputs.description: A unique identifier for the sequence record.

inputs.name: construct_name
inputs.description: The name of the DNA construct to be written to the GenBank file.

inputs.name: sequence
inputs.description: A string representing the DNA sequence of the construct.

inputs.name: components
inputs.description: A dictionary mapping component names to their sequences for annotation.

inputs.name: cloning_strategy
inputs.description: The cloning strategy used to generate the construct (e.g., 'GoldenGate').

inputs.name: output_filename
inputs.description: The desired name for the output GenBank file.

outputs.description: The filename of the generated GenBank file.
